comment: Euler's theorem, a generalization of Fermat's little theorem. If ` A ` and ` N ` are coprime, then ` A ^ phi ( N ) == 1 ` (mod ` N ` ). This is Metamath 100 proof #10. Also called Euler-Fermat theorem, see theorem 5.17 in [ApostolNT] p. 113. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Feb-2014.)
